channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier Series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson AGX Orin Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier Series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson AGX Orin Series

item.title: CVE-2022-42270|2024-08-03T13:03:45.911Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20agx%20orin%20series
item.description: NVIDIA distributions of Linux contain a vulnerability in nvdla_emu_task_submit, where unvalidated input may allow a local attacker to cause stack-based buffer overflow in kernel code, which may lead to escalation of privileges, compromised integrity and confidentiality, and denial of service.
